mapper.select: select emp.empno, emp.ename, dept.dname, emp.ssn, emp.address, emp.position, to_char(emp.hiredate,'YYYY-MM-DD') hiredate, to_char(emp.sd,'YYYY-MM-DD') sd from tbl_dept dept,(select empno, ename, deptno, ssn, address, position, hiredate, sysdate as sd from tbl_emp ,(SELECT SYSDATE FROM dual) where empno=#{empno}) emp where emp.deptno=dept.deptno
